title: Flux.1 Image (FAL.ai)
overviewMarkdown:
## Flux.1 Image (FAL.ai)

Generate images using Flux.1 models (pro / dev / schnell) via the FAL.ai API.

You must provide your FAL API key in the plugin settings.

userSettings.name: falApiKey
userSettings.label: FAL.ai API Key
userSettings.description: Enter your FAL.ai API key from the fal.ai dashboard.

userSettings.name: defaultModel
userSettings.label: Default Flux model
userSettings.description: Choose which Flux.1 model to use by default.

openaiSpec.name: generate_flux_image
openaiSpec.description: Generate an image using a Flux.1 model via the FAL.ai API.

prompt.description: Main description of the image you want to create.
